General.Name: Akshar Spintex Limited
General.Description: Akshar Spintex Limited engages in the manufacturing and trading of spun cotton yarns primarily in India. It offers cotton, organic and BCI certified cotton, viscose, modal, and excel fiber products; carded, semi combed, and combed cotton yarns; and slub, core spun, TFO, Eli twist, fancy, melange, blended, BCI certified, and organic yarns. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is based in Rajkot, India.
General.Address: C-704, The Imperial Heights, Rajkot, India, 360005
